content.question: The continuous random variable <math alttext="N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>N</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has a normal distribution with mean 7.5 and standard deviation 2.5. For which of the following is the probability equal to 0 ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the probability of, N is equal to 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the probability of, N is greater than 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>N</mi><mo>></mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the probability of, N is less than 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>N</mi><mo><</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the probability of, open parenthesis, 7 is less than N which is less than 8, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>7</mn><mo><</mo><mi>N</mi><mo><</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the probability of, N is less than 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>N</mi><mo><</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>‚Å¢</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> or <math alttext="the probability of, N is greater than 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>N</mi><mo>></mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the probability of, N is equal to 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
